election_record.label: New Hampshire 1802 Governor

overview.note: The state of New Hampshire released official totals for the state and counties but not for individual towns. Nor did the state release a list of the towns that were rejected. As a result, the town totals do not add up to the stated county totals. The county totals are official totals while the state total includes the rejected towns.
332 of the overall votes for John T. Gilman were from rejected towns.
197 of the overall votes for John Langdon were from rejected towns.

sub_unit.name: Acworth
sub_unit.note: The Courier of New Hampshire (Concord, NH), Farmer's Museum, or Lay Preacher's Gazette (Walpole, NH) and Dartmouth Gazette (Hanover, NH) list John T. Gilman with 74 votes and John Langdon with 29 votes.
The Republican Ledger, and Portsmouth Price Current (Portsmouth, NH) lists John T. Gilman with 54 votes.
The Republican Gazette (Concord, NH) lists John T. Gilman with 22 votes and John Langdon with 64 votes.

sub_unit.name: Alstead
sub_unit.note: The Farmer's Museum, or Lay Preacher's Gazette (Walpole, NH) and Republican Gazette (Concord, NH) list John T. Gilman with 178 votes and John Langdon with 4 votes.
The Observer (Haverhill, MA) and New-hampshire Sentinel (Keene, NH) list John T. Gilman with 174 votes.
The Courier of New Hampshire (Concord, NH) lists John T. Gilman with 173 votes.
The Dartmouth Gazette (Hanover, NH) lists John T. Gilman with 282 votes and John Langdon with 4 votes.

sub_unit.name: Chesterfield
sub_unit.note: The Republican Gazette (Concord, NH) lists John Langdon with 1 vote.

sub_unit.note: The Republican Gazette (Concord, NH) reports 90 votes for John Langdon in New Durham.

sub_unit.name: New Hampton
sub_unit.note: The Dartmouth Gazette (Hanover, NH) lists John T. Gilman with 33 votes.

sub_unit.name: Rochester
sub_unit.note: The Courier of New Hampshire (Concord, NH), The Observer (Haverhill, MA), The United States Oracle, and Portsmouth Advertiser (Portsmouth, NH), The New Hampshire Gazette (Portsmouth, NH), Republican Ledger, and Portsmouth Price Current (Portsmouth, NH), Dartmouth Gazette (Hanover, NH) and Republican Gazette (Concord, NH) list John T. Gilman with 85 votes and John Langdon with 187 votes.

sub_unit.name: Sanbornton
sub_unit.note: The Farmer's Museum, or Lay Preacher's Gazette (Walpole, NH), The Observer (Haverhill, MA), Dartmouth Gazette (Hanover, NH), United States Oracle, and Portsmouth Advertiser (Portsmouth, NH) and Republican Ledger, and Portsmouth Price Current (Portsmouth, NH) list John T. Gilman with 185 votes and John Langdon with 37 votes.
The Republican Gazette (Concord, NH) lists John T. Gilman with 208 votes and John Langdon with 50 votes.
The Sun. Dover Gazette and County Advertiser (Dover, NH) lists John T. Gilman with 190 votes and John Langdon with 35 votes.

sub_unit.name: Sandwich
sub_unit.note: The Farmer's Museum, or Lay Preacher's Gazette (Walpole, NH), New-hampshire Sentinel (Keene, NH) and The Sun. Dover Gazette and County Advertiser (Dover, NH) list John T. Gilman with 111 votes and John Langdon with 16 votes.
The United States Oracle, and Portsmouth Advertiser (Portsmouth, NH) and the Republican Ledger, and Portsmouth Price Current (Portsmouth, NH) list John Langdon with 15 votes.

sub_unit.name: Wolfeboro
sub_unit.note: The Farmer's Museum, or Lay Preacher's Gazette (Walpole, NH) and The Sun. Dover Gazette and County Advertiser (Dover, NH) list John T. Gilman with 21 votes and John Langdon with 71 votes.

election_record.reference: Concord Town Records, 1732-1820. 356.
